channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. Prosecco importers panic as Trump's tariff threat bubbles up

item.title: Flu cases rise again, while COVID takes a back seat

item.title: Why is the Trump administration targeting USAID?
item.description: From Day 1, the Trump team has issued a series of orders and statements aimed at the U.S. Agency for International Development.

item.title: It's like 'dead birds flying': How bird flu is spreading in the wild
item.description: That's the way one scientist puts it — referring to how infected wild birds survive long enough to spread it to birds and mammals around the world. An...

item.title: Watch horseback police chase after suspected drug dealer
item.description: Mounted police galloped after a man who fled on foot when officers approached him in Jacksonville, Florida.

item.title: Trump administration sues Chicago in latest crackdown on ‘sanctuary’ cities
US job growth slows but unemployment stays low
item.description: Firms created 143,000 jobs last month, below analysts' forecasts, but December's figure was upgraded.

item.title: Largest shark ever tagged by research group swimming off north Florida
item.description: At more than 1,650 pounds, Contender is a "true ocean giant," researchers said.

item.title: Sports reporter dies while on assignment to cover Super Bowl in New Orleans
item.description: A Kansas City sports anchor and reporter died on Wednesday while he was on assignment covering the Super Bowl, KGKC Telemundo Kansas City said.

item.title: Japan's PM to seek 'personal relationship' with Trump
item.description: Shared concerns about North Korea are likely to be a primary topic, along with economic ties.

item.title: Venezuela calls US seizure of plane 'brazen theft'
item.description: The US says the Venezuelan aircraft was involved in violations of US export control and sanctions laws.

item.title: "48 Hours" show schedule
item.description: True crime. Real justice. To miss it would be a crime.

item.title: Sweden plans tighter gun laws after deadly school shooting
item.description: Police confirm seven women and three men - aged between 28 and 68 - were killed in the country's worst mass shooting.

item.title: US border czar blames leaks for hindering immigration raids in Colorado suburb spotlighted by Trump
